actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-98.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-94) relating to the Department of Commerce, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, proposed in the President's special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, and subsequently revised in the supplementary message of January 30, 1975, transmitted under section 1014(c) of such act.

summary.text: Disapproves the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-94) relating to the Department of Commerce, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, proposed in the President's special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted under the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, and subsequently revised in the supplementary message of January 30, 1975, transmitted under such Act.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-94) relating to the Department of Commerce, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, proposed in the President's special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, and subsequently revised in the supplementary message of January 30, 1975, transmitted under section 1014(c) of such act.
